popup.pswd restrictions: Only Latin letters, numbers and special characters

general.main heading: Turn any photo into animated film version
general.description: using powerful image processing with one click through artificial intelligence
general.how many nudes: Cartoon photos created since AiPhotoEdit started

AI.section heading: Upload a photo and see what you'd look like in an animated movie scene
AI.about AI: Our neural networks will reimagine your face, see what they come up with!

clothes.unlike: Unlike all other similar algorithms that will only work with single face photos, our algorithm works absolutely fine with multiple faces in a photo.
clothes.no longer: Make your photos with friends, family and loved ones cartoon style or apply cool filters.

shapes.effects: unusual effects for processing any kind of photos
shapes.women: Filters will allow you to process absolutely any photo and make your picture unique and interesting! You can even color a black-and-white photo!

how it works.upload text: Choose a photo that you would like to transform
how it works.adjust text: Choose filter or mask to process the photo
how it works.submit text: Our servers will do the magic and transform it for you in a matter of seconds

media.porn hub: Software we’ve been waiting for ages! Finally, technology is in place.
